This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Seen in the distance hovering over mountain as the sun was setting.
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving west on Interstate 10 around 6.50pm(local time), seen object hovering in the distance ( southern sky )observed object until the sun went behind the horizon and lost sight. Object did not move for the time I observed it. also witnessed by Passenger. I did take pictures of the object. found it strange the object had no lights, showed no source of anything powering it. it did not move from the time I witnessed it. it was near Las Cruces, NM where there is a miltiary base and a military UAV test sight.
